Sentencas: Improving the conductivity of 8 mol% yttria-stabilized zirconia (8YSZ) electrolyte has enabled a lowering of the operating temperature of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Relationship between thermal environment and conductivity enhancement under millimeter-wave irradiation heating of zirconia ceramics

Sentencas: We previously reported that millimeter-wave irradiation heating increases the ionic conductivity of ceramics.
Titulo: Relationship between thermal environment and conductivity enhancement under millimeter-wave irradiation heating of zirconia ceramics

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of 8YSZ under millimeter-wave irradiation heating had been up to 20 times higher than that with conventional heating.
Titulo: Relationship between thermal environment and conductivity enhancement under millimeter-wave irradiation heating of zirconia ceramics

Sentencas: In the present study, we investigated the optimal thermal environment for millimeter-wave irradiation heating.
Titulo: Relationship between thermal environment and conductivity enhancement under millimeter-wave irradiation heating of zirconia ceramics

Sentencas: We also investigated the thermal profile of samples under millimeter-wave irradiation heating to elucidate the rate of the non-thermal effect.
Titulo: Relationship between thermal environment and conductivity enhancement under millimeter-wave irradiation heating of zirconia ceramics
